label.findfirst: Please find a bus stop first
label.selectfirst: Please select a bus stop first
label.name: Name

tip.signup:
Before using this node please sign up to Transport for London
and accept the terms and conditions to gain access to the live feeds.

html.no-buses-departing: No buses currently departing from the above stop. Please find alternative options.

uiwarn.server-error: TfL's servers have returned an error to us. The node might not work correctly. For more details, please check the console.
uiwarn.connection-error: An error occurred when connecting to TfL. The node might not work correctly. For more details, please check the console.
uiwarn.latitude-not-a-number: Latitude provided is not a number, please provide a valid number.
uiwarn.longitude-not-a-number: Longitude provided is not a number, please provide a valid number.
uiwarn.radius-not-a-number: Radius provided is not a number, please provide a valid number.
uiwarn.invalid-radius: Radius provided is invalid. Please use a positive whole number.
uiwarn.latitude-out-of-range: Latitude provided is out of range. Please revise your values.
uiwarn.longitude-out-of-range: Latitude provided is out of range. Please revise your values.
uiwarn.no-bus-stops: No bus stops found with the given parameters, please provide different values.

error.no-bus-stops: No bus stops or bus line numbers have been configured.
